content.raw: This is an important feature, but in MuJoCo the necessary programming will be done in the XML model file, at least for now.  The XML format is designed to be human readable and editable.  The runtime API will have a function "loadmodel" that tells the simulator which file to load (compilation is very fast and the delay is barely noticeable).
content.html: This is an important feature, but in MuJoCo the necessary programming will be done in the XML model file, at least for now. The XML format is designed to be human readable and editable. The runtime API will have a function "loadmodel" that tells the simulator which file to load (compilation is very fast and the delay is barely noticeable).
